name: Bubble Blade Shoot
description:
A brand new bubble game brings you the highly addictive gameplay! Work your way through increasingly challenging puzzles and shoot the bubbles to pop the target. Download Bubble Blade Shoot and spread the fun by now!

Features:
** Excellent game play and amazing graphics
** Bubble crush saga with your own pet buddy.
** Freely change and switch the bubbles color.
** Great bubble shooter, good time killer.
** Beautiful rainbow story & inspiring music.
** Frozen bubble, wubble bubble, cute color balls.
** Fun & Easy to play, hard to master.
